page.title: 20POP MUSIC
page.content: Pop music is mainly popular with younger people. A wide range of instruments are used including one or two electric guitars, a synthesizer, a drum to keep the beat and sometimes a wind instrument. Most of the instruments are electrified.The lead singer sometimes plays a guitar while he sings.Some groups such as the Flying Pickets make their voices sound like instruments. Other groups are purely instrumental. Many pop songs have a Video which helps them to sell the record. They act out the song in their Video. Every pop song is recorded. There is a single record which costs from Â£1 to Â£1.50. There are albums which cost from Â£4 to Â£6. The most popular groups today are:- Duran Duran, Wham, Sister Sledge, Frankie goes to Hollywood.
